name: Songs of Change
description:
A walking simulator where you must awaken your island's nature spirit and vanquish the spirit of stillness and stasis to save your home. Helping you on your quest is your pet cat, animated by the spirit of your village.

Pick up the spirit flute to start your adventure!

Sound on, headphones recommended. ^_^

It takes roughly 15 minutes to complete.

 Controls:

- WASD to move (hold SHIFT to run)
- Move the mouse to look around
- Click to interact

My submission for the 25th MiniJam.

Credits:
